description: NEW TRENT: iDual NT5200The iDual with 5V@1A-0.6A outputs is capable of charging two Smartphones at the same time.Performance Highlight.Apple iPad mini: > 66% battery life (only able to charge 7" Tablets).iPhone 5/ Android Smartphones: > 250% battery life.Compatible with Most Smartphones and 7" Tablets.Apple*: iPhone 5 / 4S / 4 / 3G, iPad mini, iPod Touch /NanoSamsung: Galaxy Note II / Note, Galaxy S4 / S3 / S2, Galaxy Nexus and most other Samsung phones.HTC: ONE, One X, One S, Droid Incredible 4G, and most HTC phones.Nokia: Lumia 920 / 900 / 710 / 800 / N8 / N9 and most Nokia phones.Motorola: Razr Maxx HD, Droid series, and most Motorola phonesBlackberry**: Z10, Touch, Torch, Tour, Storm 2, Bold and most Blackberry phonesLG: Nexus 4, Optimus 4X / 2X / V / S / T, and most LG phones.Other**: Nook COLOR, Nexus 7, Galaxy 8.0 / 7.0, Nintendo DSi / 3DS/XL, PSP / PS Vita and other compatible 5V devices* For Apple devices, use the original Lightning or 30 pin cable.**Some phone/tablets/devices may require a special converter cable to be compatible.Specifications.- Capacity 5200mAh@3.7V (19.2Wh)- Recharge time: 5-6 hrs- Dimension: 4.3x2.8x0.6 inchNew Trent is a trademark of New Trent Inc, and is exclusively marketed by iDealpoint on Amazon.com. Be sure to find the logo on both product and package to ensure a 10 months product warranty.
title: New Trent: iDual NT5200 - (5200mAh) Dual USB External Battery Pack for the Apple: iPad mini, iPhone 5 / 4S / 4 /3GS, iPod Touch all gen; Samsung: Galaxy Note, S4 / S3 / S2, Nexus ; HTC: ONE, One X, One S, Droid Incredible 4G; LG: Nexus 4, Optimus series; Blackberry: Z10, Touch, Torch, Tour; Motorola: Razr Maxx HD, Droid series; Nokia Lumia 900 / 800 / 700; Sony: Xperia series, GoPro and most 5V chargeable devices.
